message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of our premium product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on a high-quality item. I'm willing to offer it to you for $18,000.
Alice,  $18,000 is a bit steep for me. I'm really interested in this product, but my budget is closer to $12,000.  Would you be willing to come down to $13,000?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm still looking to get a good price for the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $18,000 and $13,000. I can offer it to you for $15,500.
Alice,  I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but $15,500 is still a bit high for me.  How about $14,000? I'm confident this is a fair price for both of us.

I understand your concerns, Bob. However, I'm still looking to get a good price for the product. I'm willing to compromise further. I can offer it to you for $15,000, which is the lowest I'm willing to go.
